content.text: From July 7-8, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 7 new pull requests opened and 8 pull requests merged. The repository also received 2 new issues during this period. A total of 9 active contributors participated in development activities during this timeframe.
PR #5435 titled 'Feat/migrate docs to fumadocs' by @SYMBaiEX is open.
PR #5431 titled 'feat(cli): improve user experience with clean spinner flow and proper task sequencing' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5427 titled 'fix: prevent CLI update from creating files in non-project directories' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5426 titled 'fix: issue 5425 - removing check if sender name includes DM' is merged.
PR #5424 titled 'fix: downgrade vite-plugin-node-polyfills to resolve client build issues' is merged.
PR #5430 titled 'feat: add LOG_TIMESTAMPS environment variable to control log timestamps' is merged.
PR #5428 titled 'fix: improve browser compatibility and update dependencies' is merged.
Issue #5434 titled 'update command doesnt work;' by @linear is CLOSED.
Issue #5432 titled 'Don't crash server start (if telegram token not found)' by @linear is OPEN.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
